content:
/>
V.ii.2.C.3.a
.
Records Needed to Determine Baseline Level of Disability
The baseline for determining whether a pre-existing disability was aggravated by service is in
all
of a Veteran's medical records for that condition, not just those covering the period of enlistment and entry on active duty.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section C - In-Service Aggravation of a Pre-Service Disability
citation: Part V, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section C
